title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Aphasia Community Group (CAG) Facilitation Skill Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental speech-language therapy skills and experience facilitating group activities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more communication strategies required for facilitating CAG (Collaborative Action Groups).
Learners can simulate the design of activities that reflect the psychosocial needs of aphasia patient groups
Learners can produce a CAG operations manual utilizing multimodal delivery methods
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
